newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia's PPI rose 2.1 pct in June - Central bank.
newsitem.headline: Colombia's PPI rose 2.1 pct in June - Central bank.

text.p: Colombia's producer price index rose 2.1 percent in June, bringing the increase during the first six months of the year to 12.2 percent, the central bank said Friday.
As measured on a cumulative basis over the past 12 months, the Banco de la Republica said the PPI had risen 17.1 percent.
The 2.1 percent increase in June followed a 1.3 percent rise in May.
The National Statstics Department is expected to publish the consumer price index for June on Tuesday following Monday's observance of a national religious holiday.
